p: (R2-Benefits) Inherited benefits of emissions: incorporates the benefits a country has obtained due to emissions prior to the year 1995, interpreted here as being the embodied emissions in national capital stock. Using capital stock estimates, GHG budgets from 2019 to 2030 are scaled identically to the past emissions consideration above, but here based on pre-1995 emissions embodied in each country´s capital stock in 1995.
